downloadTitle: What's new in Project Pro for Office 365, and sync to SharePoint Online
downloadDescription: Highlights the key investments in the Project Professional 2013 and Project Pro for Office 365 and the new exciting capabilities of building the schedule in a SharePoint list and seamlessly connecting the two - giving the Project Manager instant insight a
detailsSection: Highlights the key investments in the Project Professional 2013 and Project Pro for Office 365 and the new exciting capabilities of building the schedule in a SharePoint list and seamlessly connecting the two - giving the Project Manager instant insight a
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office application:
    • Microsoft Office PowerPoint
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to your desired file location.
  3. Find the file where you chose to save it and double-click it to open it.
